	"fountain_aura"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN"
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration"

		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			// This Values are mostly for tooltips, the unit stats are not affected
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"hp_reg"					"15"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"mp_reg"					"15"
			}

		}
		// Modifiers
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"fountain_aura_regen"
			{
				"IsHidden"				"1"
				"Passive"				"1"

				"Aura"					"modifier_fountain_regen"
				"Aura_Radius"			"500"
				"Aura_Teams"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"
				"Aura_Types"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_CREEP"
				"Aura_Flags" 			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_INVULNERABLE"
				"Aura_ApplyToCaster"	"0"
			}

			"modifier_fountain_regen"
			{
				"IsBuff" "1"
				"Passive" "0"
				"IsHidden" "0"
				"EffectName"		"particles/generic_gameplay/rune_regeneration.vpcf" //"particles/items_fx/healing_flask.vpcf" //"particles/econ/events/ti4/radiant_fountain_regen_ti4.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_PERCENTAGE"	"%hp_reg"
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_TOTAL_PERCENTAGE" 	"%mp_reg"
				}
			}
		}
	}

				}

					}

"creature_stun_passive"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"				"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"faceless_void_time_lock"
	"MaxLevel"						"5"
	"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"			"3"
	"RequiredLevel"					"1"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"trigger_chance"		"10 20 30 40"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"stun_duration"			"1"
		}
	}

	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_stun_passive"
		{
			"Passive"			"1"
			"IsHidden"			"1"
			"IsPurgable"		"0"

			"OnAttackStart"
			{
				"RemoveModifier"
				{
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_stun_buff"
					"Target"		"ATTACKER"
				}

				"Random"
				{
					"Chance"		"%trigger_chance"
					"PseudoRandom"	"DOTA_PSEUDO_RANDOM_LYCAN_CRIT"

					"OnSuccess"
					{
						"ApplyModifier"
						{
							"ModifierName"	"modifier_stun_buff"
							"Target"		"ATTACKER"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		"modifier_stun_buff"
		{
			"Passive"           "0"
			"IsHidden"		"1"
			"IsPurgable"	"0"

			"OnAttackLanded"
			{
				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_faceless_void_time_lock_stun"
					"Duration" 		"%stun_duration"
					"Target" 		"UNIT"
				}
				"RemoveModifier"
				{
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_stun_buff"
					"Target" 		"ATTACKER"
				}
			}
		}

	}
}

"troll_warlord_berserkers_rage_datadriven"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"				"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"troll_warlord_berserkers_rage_active"
	"MaxLevel"						"7"
	"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"			"3"
	"RequiredLevel"					"1"
	// Precache
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_troll_warlord.vsndevts"
		"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_troll_warlord/troll_warlord_berserk_buff.vpcf"
	}

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{


		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"bonus_damage"			"10 20 30 40 55 70 85"
//			"bonus_damage"			"30 60 90 120 165 210 255"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"accuracy_perc"				"30 40 50 60 70 85 100"
		}

	}




	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_berserkers_rage_datadriven"
		{
			"Passive"			"1"
			"IsHidden"			"1"
			"IsPurgable"		"0"

			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_troll_warlord/troll_warlord_berserk_buff.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"

			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE"		"%bonus_damage"

			}
			"OnCreated"
			{
				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"ModifierName"			"modifier_troll_warlord_berserkers_rage"
					"TARGET"				"CASTER"
				}
			}
			"OnAttackStart"
			{
				"RemoveModifier"
				{
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_cannot_miss"
					"Target"		"ATTACKER"
				}

				"Random"
				{
					"Chance"		"%accuracy_perc"
					"PseudoRandom"	"DOTA_PSEUDO_RANDOM_LYCAN_CRIT"

					"OnSuccess"
					{
						"ApplyModifier"
						{
							"ModifierName"	"modifier_cannot_miss"
							"Target"		"ATTACKER"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}


		"modifier_cannot_miss"
		{
			"Passive"           "0"
			"IsHidden"		"1"
			"IsPurgable"	"0"

			"OnAttackLanded"
			{
				"RemoveModifier"
				{
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_cannot_miss"
					"Target" 		"ATTACKER"
				}
			}

			"States"
			{
				"MODIFIER_STATE_CANNOT_MISS"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
			}
		}

	}
}

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	{

			"var_type"			"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"trance_duration"		"4 5 6 8 10"
		}

		"02"
		{
			"var_type"			"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"attack_const"		"0.45"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"bash_duration"				"0.25"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"bonus_damage"			"50"
		}

	}

	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"	"Hero_TrollWarlord.BattleTrance.Cast"
			"Target" 		"CASTER"
		}

		"FireSound"
		{

			"Target" 		"CASTER"
		}

		{
			"Target"		"CASTER"


			"Action"
			{

				{
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_battle_trance_datadriven"

					"Duration"		"%trance_duration"
				}
				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_battle_trance_buff_datadriven"
					"Target" 		"TARGET"
					"Duration"		"%trance_duration"
				}			}
		}
	}

	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_battle_trance_datadriven"
		{
			"IsBuff"			"1"
			"IsPurgable"		"0"

			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_troll_warlord/troll_warlord_battletrance_buff.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
			"OnAttackLanded"
			{

				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_time_lock_stun_datadriven"
					"Duration"		"%bash_duration"
					"Target"
					{
						"Center"	"TARGET"
						"Types"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
					}

				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/mystic_dragon/ice_shield"
					"Function"		"AphoticShieldHealth"
				}
			}

			"OnTakeDamage"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/mystic_dragon/ice_shield"
					"Function"		"AphoticShieldAbsorb"
					"DamageTaken"	"%attack_damage"
				}
			}

			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT"	"%hp_reg"
			}

		}
	}

	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift"  //This modifier is always on Slark and simply triggers a script when an autoattack lands on an enemy.
		{
			"Passive"   "1"
			"IsHidden"  "1"

			"OnAttackLanded"
			{

				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"Target"        "CASTER"
					"ModifierName"  "modifier_creature_desiccation_buff"
				}

				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"Target"        "TARGET"
					"ModifierName"  "modifier_creature_desiccation_debuff"
				}
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"            "abilities/basic"
					"Function"              "DebuffStackIncrement"
					"modifier_debuff"       "modifier_creature_desiccation_debuff_counter"
				}
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"            "abilities/basic"
					"Function"              "BuffStackIncrement"
					"modifier_buff"     "modifier_creature_desiccation_buff_counter"
				}
			}
		}

		"modifier_creature_desiccation_buff"
		{
			"Duration"              "%duration"
			"Passive"               "0"
			"IsHidden"              "1"
			"Attributes"            "MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"

			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT"  "%as_gain"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE"  "%ms_gain"
			}
				"OnDestroy"  //Decrement the visible counter.
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"        "abilities/basic"
						"Function"          "BuffStackOnDestroy"
						"modifier_buff"           "modifier_creature_desiccation_buff_counter"
					}

				}
		}

		"modifier_creature_desiccation_buff_counter"
		{
			"Duration"              "%duration"
			"Passive"               "0"
			"IsHidden"              "0"
			"IsBuff"                "1"
		}
		"modifier_creature_desiccation_debuff"
		{
			"Duration"              "%duration"
			"Passive"               "0"
			"IsHidden"              "1"
			"Attributes"            "MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"

			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT"  "%as_loss"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE"  "%ms_loss"
			}
				"OnDestroy"  //Decrement the visible counter.
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"        "abilities/basic"
						"Function"          "DebuffStackOnDestroy"

{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	"AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
	"SpellImmunityType"             "SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
	"AbilityTextureName"            "slark_essence_shift"
		"MaxLevel"                      "1"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"              "FIELD_INTEGER"
			"dmg_gain"              "5"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"              "FIELD_INTEGER"
			"dmg_loss"              "-5"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"              "FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"              "30"
		}
	}


	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift"  //This modifier is always on Slark and simply triggers a script when an autoattack lands on an enemy.
		{
			"Passive"   "1"
			"IsHidden"  "1"

			"OnAttackLanded"
			{

				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"Target"        "CASTER"
					"ModifierName"  "modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift_buff"
				}

				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"Target"        "TARGET"
					"ModifierName"  "modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift_debuff"
				}
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"            "abilities/basic"
					"Function"              "DebuffStackIncrement"
					"modifier_debuff"       "modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift_debuff_counter"
				}
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"            "abilities/basic"
					"Function"              "BuffStackIncrement"
					"modifier_buff"         "modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift_buff_counter"
				}
			}
		}

		"modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift_buff"
		{
			"Duration"              "%duration"
			"Passive"               "0"
			"IsHidden"              "1"
			"Attributes"            "MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"

			"Properties"
			{
//              "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE"       "%dmg_gain"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE"      "%dmg_gain"

			}

			"States"
			{
				"MODIFIER_STATE_CANNOT_MISS"        "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
			}

			"OnDestroy"  //Decrement the visible counter.
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"            "abilities/basic"
					"Function"              "BuffStackOnDestroy"
					"modifier_buff"         "modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift_buff_counter"
				}

			}

		}
		"modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift_buff_counter"
		{
			"Duration"              "%duration"
			"Passive"               "0"
			"IsHidden"              "0"
			"IsBuff"                "1"


		}
		"modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift_debuff"
		{
			"Duration"              "%duration"
			"Passive"               "0"
			"IsHidden"              "1"
			"Attributes"            "MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"

			"Properties"
			{

//          "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE"       "%dmg_loss"
			"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE"      "%dmg_loss"
			}
			"OnDestroy"  //Decrement the visible counter.
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"				"abilities/basic"
					"Function"					"DebuffStackOnDestroy"
					"modifier_debuff"			"modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift_debuff_counter"
				}

			}

		}
		"modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift_debuff_counter"
		{

		}

			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"				"30"
		}
	}


	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_creature_slark_essence_shift"  //This modifier is always on Slark and simply triggers a script when an autoattack lands on an enemy.
		{
			"Passive"   "1"
			"IsHidden"  "1"

			"OnAttackLanded"
			{


				"SpawnUnit"
				{
					"UnitName"		"npc_dota_dire_forest_boss_minion_1"
					"Target"
					{
						"Center"	"TARGET"

					}

					"Duration"	"%duration"
					"UnitCount"	"1"
					"UnitLimit"	"12"
					"GrantsGold"	"1"
					"GrantsXP"		"1"
					"SpawnRadius"	"10"
					"OnSpawn"
					{
						"ApplyModifier"
						{
							"ModifierName"	"modifier_phased"
							"Target"		"TARGET"
							"Duration"		"0.03"
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}


	}

"wind_elemental_ambient1"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN"
	"AbilityTextureName" 			"keeper_of_the_light_illuminate"
	"MaxLevel"						"1"

	"precache"
	{
			"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_invoker/invoker_tornado_child.vpcf"
			"particle"			"particles/neutral_fx/tornado_ambient.vpcf"
	}

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage_min"				"10 20 40 80 160"
		}

		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage_max"				"50 100 200 400 800"
		}
	}


	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_wind_elemental_ambient1"  //This modifier is always on Slark and simply triggers a script when an autoattack lands on an enemy.
		{
			"Passive"   "1"
			"IsHidden"  "1"

			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_invoker/invoker_tornado_child.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
		}
		"modifier_wind_elemental_ambient2"  //This modifier is always on Slark and simply triggers a script when an autoattack lands on an enemy.
		{
			"Passive"   "1"
			"IsHidden"  "1"

			"EffectName"		"particles/neutral_fx/tornado_ambient.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"

		}

	}
}

	"AbilityTextureName"			"lich_frost_armor"
	"MaxLevel"		"1"
	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.4 0.4 0.4 0.4"


	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	// Special

		}

			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"aura_radius"		"900"
		}
	}

	{
		"particle"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_lich/lich_frost_armor.vpcf"

		"particle"	"particles/status_fx/status_effect_frost.vpcf"
		"soundfile"	"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_lich.vsndevts"
	}

	"OnSpellStart"
	{


		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_frost_armor"
			"Target"		"TARGET"
			"Duration"		"%AbilityDuration"
		}
	}

	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_frost_armor_aura"
		{
			"Passive"			"1"
			"IsHidden"			"1"



			"Aura"          	"modifier_frost_armor"
			"Aura_Radius"   	"%aura_radius"
			"Aura_Teams"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"

			"Aura_Flags"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
		}

		{
			"OnCreated"
			{
				"FireSound"
				{
					"EffectName"	"Hero_Lich.FrostArmor"
					"Target"		"TARGET"
				}
			}

			}

			"EffectAttachType"		"follow_overhead"

			"StatusEffectName"		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_frost_armor.vpcf"
			"StatusEffectPriority"	"10"

			"OnAttacked"
			{
				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_frost_armor_slow"
					"Target"		"ATTACKER"
					"Duration"		"%slow_duration"
				}

				"FireSound"
				{
					"EffectName"	"Hero_Lich.FrostArmorDamage"
					"Target"		"TARGET"
				}
			}
		}

		"modifier_frost_armor_slow"
		{
			"IsDebuff"	"1"

			"StatusEffectName"		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_frost.vpcf"

	"wisp_critical_strike"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"MaxLevel"						"30"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"wisp/critical_strike"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"crit_chance"				"25"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"crit_mult"					"140 155 170 185 200 220 240 260 280 300 320 340 360 380 400 420 440 460 480 500"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_wisp_critical_strike_passive"
			{
				"Passive"			"1"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"OnAttackStart"
				{
					"RemoveModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_wisp_critical_strike"
						"Target"		"CASTER"
					}

					"Random"
					{
						"Chance"		"%crit_chance"
						"PseudoRandom"	"DOTA_PSEUDO_RANDOM_LYCAN_CRIT"

						"OnSuccess"
						{
							"ApplyModifier"
							{
								"ModifierName"	"modifier_wisp_critical_strike"
								"Target"		"CASTER"
							}
						}
					}
				}

			}

			"modifier_wisp_critical_strike"
			{
				"IsHidden"		"1"
				"IsPurgable"	"0"

				"OnAttackLanded"
				{
					"RemoveModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_wisp_critical_strike"
						"Target" 		"CASTER"
					}
				}

				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_CRITICALSTRIKE" "%crit_mult"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	"wisp_light_armor"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET"
		"AbilityTextureName"	"wisp/light_armor"
		"MaxLevel"						"10"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		{
			"soundfile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_medusa.vsndevts"
			"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_wisp/wisp_overcharge.vpcf"
			"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_medusa/medusa_mana_shield.vpcf"
			"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_medusa/medusa_mana_shield_cast.vpcf"
		}

		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.5"

		// Time
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"22.0"

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"0"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"resist"			"-14 -18 -22 -26 -30 -36 -42 -48 -54 -60"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"duration"			"6"
			}

		}

		"OnSpellStart"
		{


			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_wisp_light_armor"
				"Target"		"CASTER"
			}

			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"	"Hero_Medusa.ManaShield.On"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
			"FireEffect"
			{
				"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_medusa/medusa_mana_shield_cast.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
				"Target"            "CASTER"
			}
		}


		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_wisp_light_armor"
			{
				"IsBuff"	"1"
				"Duration"	"%duration"

				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_medusa/medusa_mana_shield.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_wisp/wisp_overcharge.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"	"follow_overhead"
						"Target"			"TARGET"

					}
				}
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE"		"%resist"
				}
			}
		}
	}
